verses.verse: Children<WG5043>, obey<WG5219> your<WG5216> parents<WG1118> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>: for<WG1063> this<WG5124> is<WG2076> right<WG1342>.
Honour<WG5091> thy<WG4675> father<WG3962> and<WG2532> mother<WG3384>; (which<WG3748> is<WG2076> the first<WG4413> commandment<WG1785> with<WG1722> promise<WG1860>;)
That<WG2443> it may be<WG1096> well<WG2095> with thee<WG4671>, and<WG2532> thou mayest<WG2071> live long<WG3118> on<WG1909> the earth<WG1093>.

And<WG2532>, ye fathers<WG3962>, provoke<WG3949> not<WG3361> your<WG5216> children<WG5043> to wrath<WG3949>: but<WG235> bring<WG1625> them<WG846> up<WG1625> in<WG1722> the nurture<WG3809> and<WG2532> admonition<WG3559> of the Lord<WG2962>.

Servants<WG1401>, be obedient<WG5219> to them that are your masters<WG2962> according to<WG2596> the flesh<WG4561>, with<WG3326> fear<WG5401> and<WG2532> trembling<WG5156>, in<WG1722> singleness<WG572> of your<WG5216> heart<WG2588>, as<WG5613> unto Christ<WG5547>;

Not<WG3361> with<WG2596> eyeservice<WG3787>, as<WG5613> menpleasers<WG441>; but<WG235> as<WG5613> the servants<WG1401> of Christ<WG5547>, doing<WG4160> the will<WG2307> of God<WG2316> from<WG1537> the heart<WG5590>;
With<WG3326> good will<WG2133> doing service<WG1398>, as to the Lord<WG2962>, and<WG2532> not<WG3756> to men<WG444>:

Knowing<WG1492> that<WG3754> whatsoever<WG3739><WG1437><WG5100> good thing<WG18> any man<WG1538> doeth<WG4160>, the same<WG5124> shall he receive<WG2865> of<WG3844> the Lord<WG2962>, whether<WG1535> he be bond<WG1401> or<WG1535> free<WG1658>.

And<WG2532>, ye masters<WG2962>, do<WG4160> the same things<WG846> unto<WG4314> them<WG846>, forbearing<WG447> threatening<WG547>: knowing<WG1492> that<WG3754> your<WG5216><WG846> Master<WG2962> also<WG2532> is<WG2076> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>; neither<WG2532><WG3756> is there<WG2076> respect of persons<WG4382> with<WG3844> him<WG846>.
Finally<WG3063>, my<WG3450> brethren<WG80>, be strong<WG1743> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>, and<WG2532> in<WG1722> the power<WG2904> of his<WG846> might<WG2479>.
Put on<WG1746> the whole armour<WG3833> of God<WG2316>, that<WG4314> ye<WG5209> may be able<WG1410> to stand<WG2476> against<WG4314> the wiles<WG3180> of the devil<WG1228>.

For<WG3754> we<WG2254> wrestle<WG3823> not<WG3756> against<WG2076><WG4314> flesh<WG4561> and<WG2532> blood<WG129>, but<WG235> against<WG4314> principalities<WG746>, against<WG4314> powers<WG1849>, against<WG4314> the rulers<WG2888> of the darkness<WG4655> of this<WG5127> world<WG165>, against<WG4314> spiritual<WG4152> wickedness<WG4189> in<WG1722> high<WG2032> places.

Wherefore<WG1223><WG5124> take unto you<WG353> the whole armour<WG3833> of God<WG2316>, that<WG2443> ye may be able<WG1410> to withstand<WG436> in<WG1722> the evil<WG4190> day<WG2250>, and<WG2532> having done<WG2716> all<WG537>, to stand<WG2476>.

Stand<WG2476> therefore<WG3767>, having<WG4024> your<WG5216> loins<WG3751> girt about<WG4024> with<WG1722> truth<WG225>, and<WG2532> having on<WG1746> the breastplate<WG2382> of righteousness<WG1343>;
And<WG2532> your feet<WG4228> shod<WG5265> with<WG1722> the preparation<WG2091> of the gospel<WG2098> of peace<WG1515>;

Above<WG1909> all<WG3956>, taking<WG353> the shield<WG2375> of faith<WG4102>, wherewith<WG1722><WG3739> ye shall be able<WG1410> to quench<WG4570> all<WG3956> the fiery<WG4448> darts<WG956> of the wicked<WG4190>.
And<WG2532> take<WG1209> the helmet<WG4030> of salvation<WG4992>, and<WG2532> the sword<WG3162> of the Spirit<WG4151>, which is<WG3603> the word<WG4487> of God<WG2316>:

Praying<WG4336> always<WG1722><WG2540><WG3956> with<WG1223> all<WG3956> prayer<WG4335> and<WG2532> supplication<WG1162> in<WG1722> the Spirit<WG4151>, and<WG2532> watching<WG69> thereunto<WG1519><WG5124><WG846> with<WG1722> all<WG3956> perseverance<WG4343> and<WG2532> supplication<WG1162> for<WG4012> all<WG3956> saints<WG40>;

And<WG2532> for<WG5228> me<WG1700>, that<WG2443> utterance<WG3056> may be given<WG1325> unto me<WG3427>, that I may open<WG1722><WG457> my<WG3450> mouth<WG4750> boldly<WG1722><WG3954>, to make known<WG1107> the mystery<WG3466> of the gospel<WG2098>,
For<WG5228> which<WG3739> I am an ambassador<WG4243> in<WG1722> bonds<WG254>: that<WG2443> therein<WG1722><WG846> I may speak boldly<WG3955>, as<WG5613> I<WG3165> ought<WG1163> to speak<WG2980>.

But<WG1161> that<WG2443> ye<WG5210> also<WG2532> may know<WG1492> my<WG1691> affairs<WG2596>, and how<WG5101> I do<WG4238>, Tychicus<WG5190>, a beloved<WG27> brother<WG80> and<WG2532> faithful<WG4103> minister<WG1249> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>, shall make known<WG1107> to you<WG5213> all things<WG3956>:

Whom<WG3739> I have sent<WG3992> unto<WG4314> you<WG5209> for<WG1519> the same<WG846> purpose<WG5124>, that<WG2443> ye might know<WG1097> our<WG2257> affairs<WG4012>, and<WG2532> that he might comfort<WG3870> your<WG5216> hearts<WG2588>.
Peace<WG1515> be to the brethren<WG80>, and<WG2532> love<WG26> with<WG3326> faith<WG4102>, from<WG575> God<WG2316> the Father<WG3962> and<WG2532> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>.

Grace<WG5485> be with<WG3326> all<WG3956> them that love<WG25> our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> in<WG1722> sincerity<WG861>. Amen<WG281>. Â¶ Written from Rome unto the Ephesians by Tychicus.
